description: Try our easy to follow Calamari Salad With Mint & Dill recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Calamari Salad With Mint & Dill Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, shake the oil, dill, and remaining 1 tbs lime juice in a small jar, season with salt and pepper, then shake again. Combine the mâché, mint, and onion on a platter and toss with the dressing. Top with the grilled calamari and serve immediately.
